name: .SPRYZIP
summary: Learn about .SPRYZIP files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

instructions: You can open a SPRYZIP file in LumaFusion (Mac, iOS). After you do, LumaFusion will show the video editing project your SPRYZIP file contains.

If necessary, you can also use any Zip-decompression utility, such as Apple Archive Utility (Mac) or 7-Zip (Windows), to extract the videos, audio, and other files your SPRYZIP file contains. Before doing so, you may have to rename the file's extension from .spryzip to .zip.
